mapper.sql: select pump_id, tenant_id, fire_zone_id, pump_number, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from laocz_pump
mapper.select:
SELECT lp.pump_id, lp.pump_number, lai.area_name, lfzi.fire_zone_name, lpp.use_mark, gpi.point_id, gpi.point_name, gpi.id as point_key FROM laocz_pump lp LEFT JOIN laocz_fire_zone_info lfzi on lp.fire_zone_id = lfzi.fire_zone_id LEFT JOIN laocz_area_info lai on lfzi.area_id = lai.area_id LEFT JOIN laocz_pump_point lpp on lpp.pump_id = lp.pump_id LEFT JOIN grass_point_info gpi on gpi.id = lpp.point_primary_key
and lp.pump_id = #{pumpNumber}

SELECT gpi.point_type, gpi.point_id, gpi.point_name FROM laocz_pump lp JOIN laocz_pump_point lpp ON lp.pump_id = lpp.pump_id LEFT JOIN grass_point_info gpi ON gpi.id = lpp.point_primary_key
and lp.pump_id = #{pumpId}
mapper.insert:
insert into laocz_pump ( pump_id , tenant_id , fire_zone_id , pump_number , create_by , create_time , update_by , update_time , remark) values
( #{item.pumpId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.fireZoneId}, #{item.pumpNumber}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark})
